Posts.Content: Jul 17, 2017 06:34AM justbeatgeno wrote: Hi mommakat. I don't have my results yet, but I did just see the radiologist report and did some research. It looks like anyone who is a BIRADS 4 or 5, per the NIH, should have their results considered "discordant" if the path report comes back benign. Better safe than sorry, I suppose. I'm BIRADS 5, so I'm pretty much expecting a malignancy. But once I read that today, even if it's benign, I guess I'll be going back in to check again to be sure.
Posts.Title: Discordant Results from CNB mommakat MTwoman
